physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Impaired visual acuity of both eyes, moderate weakness with atrophy of distal limb muscles, bilateral pes equinovarus, impaired sensory modalities distally in upper and lower limbs, absent deep tendon reflexes.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Difficulty in walking worsened progressively from age 13.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Moderate to severe symmetric muscle weakness and atrophy in upper and lower limbs, absent deep tendon reflexes, vision loss in left eye due to phthisis bulbi, right eye acuity of 0.6.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Difficulty in walking increased slightly from onset.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Severe sensory disturbance in distal extremities, absent deep tendon reflexes, systemic hypertension, and a talipes equinus deformity.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Onset of muscle weakness in lower limbs began at age 6.
